name: type?: 'default' | 'outlined' | 'filled' | 'underlined' | 'blurred' | 'flat' | 'faded' | string
description: Defines the style type of the selection.

name: variant?: 'default' | 'primary' | 'secondary' | 'tertiary' | 'success' | 'warning' | 'danger' | string
description: Specifies the color variant for the selection.

name: colors?: string
description: Defines a custom color palette for the selection.

name: selectionLabel?: string
description: Label text displayed next to the selection.

name: disabled?: boolean
description: Disables the selection component if set to true.

name: isInvalid?: boolean
description: Indicates if the selection has an invalid value.

name: errorMessage?: string
description: Message to be displayed when selection is invalid.

name: labelProps?: { className?: string; labelPosition?: 'inside' | 'outside'; }
description: Defines additional properties for the label, such as position and CSS class.

name: class?: string
description: CSS class for the selection component.

name: classOptionsContainer?: string
description: CSS class for the container that holds the options.

name: classSelected?: string
description: CSS class for the selected option.

name: classInputBox?: string
description: CSS class for the input box of the selection.

name: placeholder?: string
description: Placeholder text for the selection input.

name: onSelect?: undefined | ((value: any) => void)
description: Callback function triggered when an option is selected.

name: children: Snippet
description: The children elements to be rendered inside the selection.
